attributes.action: Explain the potentially inferred blackmail issue surrounding pay through the nose road charging schemes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It has been suggested from written internet text that the government is prepared to give up to 1.4bn to councils for improvement to transportation with the proviso that they charge for road use? 
Soon to be ex Prime Minister, please explain these actions to the over tax paying general populus of England.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
